name: Flip Jacks
description: Flip Jacks is a physics-based poker game in AR. Each game takes only 30 seconds. Can you flip your way to a winning hand?

icon.alt: Flip Jacks logo which is the top left of a Jack card.

name: onlybuild
description: A zero-config cli for building static websites.

image.alt: Screenshot of the README.md for the onlybuild repo detailing the features included in the project.

name: Rhythm Game Utilities
description: This library is a collection of utilities for creating rhythm games like Tap Tap Revenge, Guitar Hero, and Rock Band. It is meant to be used within any game engine that supports loading C++ libraries, such as Unity, Unreal, and Godot.

name: Handcrank Engine
description: Handcrank is a game engine built in C++ on top of SDL with a focus on a simple, Unity GameObject-like object class structure inheritance. Handcrank is currently in active development.

name: QR Code Generator
description: Frustrated with the quality of existing free (and paid) QR code generators, I built this tool to be simple, free, and without data analytics.

image.alt: Screenshot of a generated QR code.

name: Secret Scene
description: An OBS automatic scene switcher for sensitive applications. Works on the same machine OBS is running on or another computer on the same network.

image.alt: Screenshot of the macOS version of Secret Scene.

name: generate-local-changelog
description: This homebrew distributed CLI generates local CHANGELOG.md files without access to a repo's remote via an API. The latest version has been ported to Rust for improved performance.

image.alt: Screenshot of a CHANGELOG.md file generated by generate-local-changelog.

name: CandyCoded
description: CandyCoded is a collection of useful components and extensions for building in Unity. Whether you are building a quick prototype or a production-ready experience, CandyCoded will help you get there.

icon.alt: CandyCoded icon which is a pink lollipop.

image.alt: Screenshot of the README.md for the CandyCoded repo detailing the features included in the project.

name: doxdox
description: doxdox is a tool for auto-generating documentation using JSDoc headers locally or via a hosted platform pointed at a public GitHub repo.

icon.alt: doxdox icon which is a closed book with a bookmark.

image.alt: Screenshot of the doxdox.org landing page showing off examples of different output from doxdox.

name: Match Attack
description: Match Attack is a memory game with a twist. Collect tiles that can then be used against an evil clown hell-bent on killing you. Made at the Global Game Jam in January 2021

icon.alt: Match Attack icon which is a crazed raccoon.

image.alt: Picture of the logo for Match Attack which is the words Match Attack over two arrows for a bow. Surrounding it are different example of tiles that can be matched in the game.

name: Card Against Undefined
description: An online version of Cards Against Humanity with support for playing with expansions and custom decks.

icon.alt: Cards Against Undefined logo which is two white cards and a black card fanned out like they are being held up.

image.alt: An iPad and an iPhone both playing Cards Against Undefined showing the user selecting a black card.

name: Smoothie Operator
description: Smoothie Operator is a Unity port of an HTML JavaScript canvas game made at the Purple Monkey Game Jam.

icon.alt: Icon of a strawberry, one of the fruits you can collect in the Smoothie Operator game.

name: Top Down
description: A simple, read-only, Trello board aggregator.

image.alt: A demo showing two Trello boards combined into one board.

name: get-unity
description: Command line tool for getting the download URL for the latest or specific version of Unity.

name: @neogeek/create-app
description: â–² A heavily opinionated starter template.
